divs: Sighting DetailsI was sitting in my bedroom, i happened to look out the window and i saw and orange light hover a few hundred feet in the air. I looked down to type something into google, i looked up about a minute later and it was gone. I live under an airport's flight path, but i've seen enough planes to know, that wasn't one. I laso noticed further away in the distance when i look up after typing into google, a faint light changing colour flying very fast of into the distant ( too fast for anything of human technology) though this time it looked more like a missle of somekind, maybe chasing after previous object, i am very terrified of what i have just seen and at this moment in time i am getting shivers up my spine just thinking and typing about it.
trends: There have been 22 other sightings in Glasgow
There were no other sightings in Glasgow on or around February 23rd 2010
